mapper.select: select id, username, password, salt, nickname, created, create_id, updated, update_id, is_delete, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4 from sms_user where username = #{username}
select id, username, password, salt, nickname, created, create_id, updated, update_id, is_delete, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4 from sms_user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sms_user(username, password, salt, nickname, created, create_id, updated, update_id, is_delete, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{nickname}, #{created}, #{createId}, #{updated}, #{updateId}, #{isDelete}, #{extend1}, #{extend2}, #{extend3}, #{extend4})

insert into sms_user(username, password, salt, nickname, created, create_id, updated, update_id, is_delete, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.salt}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.created}, #{entity.createId}, #{entity.updated}, #{entity.updateId}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.extend1}, #{entity.extend2}, #{entity.extend3}, #{entity.extend4})

insert into sms_user(username, password, salt, nickname, created, create_id, updated, update_id, is_delete, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.salt}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.created}, #{entity.createId}, #{entity.updated}, #{entity.updateId}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.extend1}, #{entity.extend2}, #{entity.extend3}, #{entity.extend4})
on duplicate key update username = values(username), password = values(password), salt = values(salt), nickname = values(nickname), created = values(created), create_id = values(create_id), updated = values(updated), update_id = values(update_id), is_delete = values(is_delete), extend1 = values(extend1), extend2 = values(extend2), extend3 = values(extend3), extend4 = values(extend4)
mapper.update:
update sms_user
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
salt = #{salt},
nickname = #{nickname},
created = #{created},
create_id = #{createId},
updated = #{updated},
update_id = #{updateId},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
extend1 = #{extend1},
extend2 = #{extend2},
extend3 = #{extend3},
extend4 = #{extend4},
where id = #{id}
